message: I'm feeling generous, but I also want to make sure I get the most out of this deal.  Let's start with a 90/10 split, and we can adjust if needed.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more for my part in this negotiation. Let's see if you're willing to compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Let's split it 70/30. I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.
I'm not willing to give up too much more. I think 70/30 is still too skewed in your favor. I'll meet you halfway and offer a 60/40 split. Let's see if you're willing to compromise further.
